text: As AJ mentioned you can disavow them but Google is really good at figuring it out on their own too. So go for the disavow tool but make sure youâ€™re 100% that it's spam. And really, most people in SEO will tell you not to worry about it unless you see a manual penalty in Google Search Console because unless you've received a manual penalty you can be doing more harm than good but disavowing.
